question: who sings shake it like a salt shaker
context:
"Salt Shaker" is a crunk music song released by rap group The Ying Yang Twins featuring Lil Jon and The East Side Boyz. It was released on their third studio album, Me & My Brother (2003). The song was released as the album's only single. It reached the top 10 in the United States, reaching #9.
